7760 
7761  rect.x += kLeftInset;
7762  rect.y += kTopInset;
7763  rect.width -= kLeftInset * 2;
7764  rect.height -= kTopInset;
7765 
7766  mTrackInfo.SetTrackInfoFont(dc);
7767  dc->SetTextForeground(theTheme.Colour(clrTrackPanelText));
7768 
7769  bool bIsWave = (t->GetKind() == Track::Wave);
7770 #ifdef USE_MIDI
7771  bool bIsNote = (t->GetKind() == Track::Note);
7772 #endif
7773  // don't enable bHasMuteSolo for Note track because it will draw in the
7774  // wrong place.
7775  mTrackInfo.DrawBackground(dc, rect, t->GetSelected(), bIsWave, labelw, vrul);
7776 
7777  // Vaughan, 2010-08-24: No longer doing this.
7778  // Draw sync-lock tiles in ruler area.
7779  //if (t->IsSyncLockSelected()) {
7780  // wxRect tileFill = rect;
7781  // tileFill.x = GetVRulerOffset();
7782  // tileFill.width = GetVRulerWidth();
7783  // TrackArtist::DrawSyncLockTiles(dc, tileFill);
7784  //}
7785 
7786  DrawBordersAroundTrack(t, dc, rect, labelw, vrul);
7787  DrawShadow(t, dc, rect);
7788 
7789  rect.width = mTrackInfo.GetTrackInfoWidth();
7790  bool captured = (t == mCapturedTrack);
7791  mTrackInfo.DrawCloseBox(dc, rect, (captured && mMouseCapture==IsClosing));
7792  mTrackInfo.DrawTitleBar(dc, rect, t, (captured && mMouseCapture==IsPopping));
7793 
7794  mTrackInfo.DrawMinimize(dc, rect, t, (captured && mMouseCapture==IsMinimizing));
7795 
7796  // Draw the sync-lock indicator if this track is in a sync-lock selected group.
7797  if (t->IsSyncLockSelected())
7798  {
7799  wxRect syncLockIconRect;
7800  mTrackInfo.GetSyncLockIconRect(rect, syncLockIconRect);
7801  wxBitmap syncLockBitmap(theTheme.Image(bmpSyncLockIcon));
7802  // Icon is 12x12 and syncLockIconRect is 16x16.
7803  dc->DrawBitmap(syncLockBitmap,
7804  syncLockIconRect.x + 3,
7805  syncLockIconRect.y + 2,
7806  true);
7807  }
7808 
7809  mTrackInfo.DrawBordersWithin( dc, rect, bIsWave );
7810 
7811  if (bIsWave) {
7812  mTrackInfo.DrawMuteSolo(dc, rect, t, (captured && mMouseCapture == IsMuting), false, HasSoloButton());
7813  mTrackInfo.DrawMuteSolo(dc, rect, t, (captured && mMouseCapture == IsSoloing), true, HasSoloButton());
7814 
7815  mTrackInfo.DrawSliders(dc, (WaveTrack *)t, rect, captured);
7816  if (!t->GetMinimized()) {
7817 
7818  int offset = 8;
7819  if (rect.y + 22 + 12 < rec.y + rec.height - 19)
7820  dc->DrawText(TrackSubText(t),
7821  trackRect.x + offset,
7822  trackRect.y + 22);
7823 
7824  if (rect.y + 38 + 12 < rec.y + rec.height - 19)
7825  dc->DrawText(GetSampleFormatStr(((WaveTrack *) t)->GetSampleFormat()),
7826  trackRect.x + offset,
7827  trackRect.y + 38);
7828  }
7829  }
7830 
7831 #ifdef USE_MIDI
7832  else if (bIsNote) {
7833  // Note tracks do not have text, e.g. "Mono, 44100Hz, 32-bit float", so
7834  // Mute & Solo button goes higher. To preserve existing AudioTrack code,
7835  // we move the buttons up by pretending track is higher (at lower y)
7836  rect.y -= 34;
7837  rect.height += 34;
7838  wxRect midiRect;
7839  mTrackInfo.GetTrackControlsRect(trackRect, midiRect);
7840  // Offset by height of Solo/Mute buttons:
7841  midiRect.y += 15;
7842  midiRect.height -= 21; // allow room for minimize button at bottom
7843 
7844 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_MIDI_OUT
7845  // the offset 2 is just to leave a little space between channel buttons
7846  // and velocity slider (if any)
7847  int h = ((NoteTrack *) t)->DrawLabelControls(*dc, midiRect) + 2;
7848 
7849  // Draw some lines for MuteSolo buttons:
7850  if (rect.height > 84) {
7851  AColor::Line(*dc, rect.x+48 , rect.y+50, rect.x+48, rect.y + 66);
7852  // bevel below mute/solo
7853  AColor::Line(*dc, rect.x, rect.y + 66, mTrackInfo.GetTrackInfoWidth(), rect.y + 66);
7854  }
7855  mTrackInfo.DrawMuteSolo(dc, rect, t,
7856  (captured && mMouseCapture == IsMuting), false, HasSoloButton());
7857  mTrackInfo.DrawMuteSolo(dc, rect, t,
7858  (captured && mMouseCapture == IsSoloing), true, HasSoloButton());
7859 
7860  // place a volume control below channel buttons (this will
7861  // control an offset to midi velocity).
7862  // DrawVelocitySlider places slider assuming this is a Wave track
7863  // and using a large offset to leave room for other things,
7864  // so here we make a fake rectangle as if it is for a Wave
7865  // track, but it is offset to place the slider properly in
7866  // a Note track. This whole placement thing should be redesigned
7867  // to lay out different types of tracks and controls
7868  wxRect gr; // gr is gain rectangle where slider is drawn
7869  mTrackInfo.GetGainRect(rect, gr);
7870  rect.y = rect.y + h - gr.y; // ultimately want slider at rect.y + h
7871  rect.height = rect.height - h + gr.y;
7872  // save for mouse hit detect:
7873  ((NoteTrack *) t)->SetGainPlacementRect(rect);
7874  mTrackInfo.DrawVelocitySlider(dc, (NoteTrack *) t, rect);
7875 #endif
7876  }
7877 #endif // USE_MIDI
7878 }
7879 
7880 void TrackPanel::DrawOutsideOfTrack(Track * t, wxDC * dc, const wxRect & rect)
7881 {
7882  // Fill in area outside of the track
7883  AColor::TrackPanelBackground(dc, false);
7884  wxRect side;
7885 
7886  // Area between panel border and left track border
7887  side = rect;
7888  side.width = kLeftInset;
7889  dc->DrawRectangle(side);
7890 
7891  // Area between panel border and top track border
7892  side = rect;
7893  side.height = kTopInset;
7894  dc->DrawRectangle(side);
7895 
7896  // Area between panel border and right track border
7897  side = rect;
7898  side.x += side.width - kTopInset;
7899  side.width = kTopInset;
7900  dc->DrawRectangle(side);
7901 
7902  // Area between tracks of stereo group
7903 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
7904  if (t->GetLinked() || MONO_WAVE_PAN(t)) {
7905  side = rect;
7906  side.y += t->GetHeight() - 1;
7907  side.height = kTopInset + 1;
7908  dc->DrawRectangle(side);
7909  }
7910 #else
7911  if (t->GetLinked()) {
7912  // Paint the channel separator over (what would be) the shadow of the top
7913  // channel, and the top inset of the bottom channel
7914  side = rect;
7915  side.y += t->GetHeight() - kShadowThickness;
7916  side.height = kTopInset + kShadowThickness;
7917  dc->DrawRectangle(side);
7918  }
7919 #endif
7920 }
7921 
7922 void TrackPanel::DrawOverlays(bool repaint)
7923 {
7924  // Determine which overlays are outdated.
7925  enum {
7926  n_pairs =
7927 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_SCRUBBING_BASIC
7928  3
7929 #else
7930  2
7931 #endif
7932  };
7933  std::pair<wxRect, bool> pairs[n_pairs] = {
7934  GetIndicatorRectangle(),
7935  GetCursorRectangle(),
7936 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_SCRUBBING_BASIC
7937  GetScrubSpeedRectangle(),
7938 #endif
7939  };
7940 
7941  {
7942  // Drawing now goes directly to the client area
7943  wxClientDC dc(this);
7944 
7945  // See what requires redrawing. If repainting, all.
7946  // If not, then whatever is outdated, and whatever will be damaged by
7947  // undrawing.
7948  // By redrawing only what needs it, we avoid flashing things like
7949  // the cursor that are drawn with xor.
7950  if (!repaint) {
7951  bool done;
7952  do {
7953  done = true;
7954  for (int ii = 0; ii < n_pairs; ++ii) {
7955  for (int jj = ii + 1; jj < n_pairs; ++jj) {
7956  if (pairs[ii].second != pairs[jj].second &&
7957  pairs[ii].first.Intersects(pairs[jj].first)) {
7958  done = false;
7959  pairs[ii].second = pairs[jj].second = true;
7960  }
7961  }
7962  }
7963  } while (!done);
7964  }
7965  }
7966 
7967  if (repaint || pairs[0].second) {
7968  wxClientDC dc(this);
7969  UndrawIndicator(dc);
7970  }
7971  if (repaint || pairs[1].second) {
7972  wxClientDC dc(this);
7973  UndrawCursor(dc);
7974  }
7975 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_SCRUBBING_BASIC
7976  if (repaint || pairs[2].second) {
7977  wxClientDC dc(this);
7978  UndrawScrubSpeed(dc);
7979  }
7980 #endif
7981 
7982  if (repaint || pairs[0].second) {
7983  wxClientDC dc(this);
7984  DoDrawIndicator(dc);
7985  }
7986  if (repaint || pairs[1].second) {
7987  wxClientDC dc(this);
7988  DoDrawCursor(dc);
7989  }
7990 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_SCRUBBING_BASIC
7991  if (repaint || pairs[2].second) {
7992  wxClientDC dc(this);
7993  DoDrawScrubSpeed(dc);
7994  }
7995 #endif
7996 }
7997 
7999 void TrackPanel::HighlightFocusedTrack(wxDC * dc, const wxRect & rect)
8000 {
8001  wxRect theRect = rect;
8002  theRect.x += kLeftInset;
8003  theRect.y += kTopInset;
8004  theRect.width -= kLeftInset * 2;
8005  theRect.height -= kTopInset;
8006 
8007  dc->SetBrush(*wxTRANSPARENT_BRUSH);
8008 
8009  AColor::TrackFocusPen(dc, 0);
8010  dc->DrawRectangle(theRect.x - 1, theRect.y - 1, theRect.width + 2, theRect.height + 2);
8011 
8012  AColor::TrackFocusPen(dc, 1);
8013  dc->DrawRectangle(theRect.x - 2, theRect.y - 2, theRect.width + 4, theRect.height + 4);
8014 
8015  AColor::TrackFocusPen(dc, 2);
8016  dc->DrawRectangle(theRect.x - 3, theRect.y - 3, theRect.width + 6, theRect.height + 6);
8017 }
8018 
8019 void TrackPanel::UpdateVRulers()
8020 {
8021  TrackListOfKindIterator iter(Track::Wave, mTracks);
8022  for (Track *t = iter.First(); t; t = iter.Next()) {
8023  UpdateTrackVRuler(t);
8024  }
8025 
8026  UpdateVRulerSize();
8027 }
8028 
8029 void TrackPanel::UpdateVRuler(Track *t)
8030 {
8031  UpdateTrackVRuler(t);
8032 
8033  UpdateVRulerSize();
8034 }
8035 
8036 void TrackPanel::UpdateTrackVRuler(Track *t)
8037 {
8038  wxASSERT(t);
8039  if (!t)
8040  return;
8041 
8042  wxRect rect(GetVRulerOffset(),
8043  kTopMargin,
8044  GetVRulerWidth(),
8045  t->GetHeight() - (kTopMargin + kBottomMargin));
8046 
8047  mTrackArtist->UpdateVRuler(t, rect);
8048  Track *l = t->GetLink();
8049  if (l)
8050  {
8051  rect.height = l->GetHeight() - (kTopMargin + kBottomMargin);
8052  mTrackArtist->UpdateVRuler(l, rect);
8053  }
8054 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
8055  else if(MONO_WAVE_PAN(t)){
8056  rect.height = t->GetHeight(true) - (kTopMargin + kBottomMargin);
8057  mTrackArtist->UpdateVRuler(t, rect);
8058  }
8059 #endif
8060 }
8061 
8062 void TrackPanel::UpdateVRulerSize()
8063 {
8064  TrackListIterator iter(mTracks);
8065  Track *t = iter.First();
8066  if (t) {
8067  wxSize s = t->vrulerSize;
8068  while (t) {
8069  s.IncTo(t->vrulerSize);
8070  t = iter.Next();
8071  }
8072  if (vrulerSize != s) {
8073  vrulerSize = s;
8074  mRuler->SetLeftOffset(GetLeftOffset()); // bevel on AdornedRuler
8075  mRuler->Refresh();
8076  }
8077  }
8078  Refresh(false);
8079 }
8080 
8084 
8087 void TrackPanel::OnPrevTrack( bool shift )
8088 {
8089  TrackListIterator iter( mTracks );
8090  Track* t = GetFocusedTrack();
8091  if( t == NULL ) // if there isn't one, focus on last
8092  {
8093  t = iter.Last();
8094  SetFocusedTrack( t );
8095  EnsureVisible( t );
8096  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8097  return;
8098  }
8099 
8100  Track* p = NULL;
8101  bool tSelected = false;
8102  bool pSelected = false;
8103  if( shift )
8104  {
8105  p = mTracks->GetPrev( t, true ); // Get previous track
8106  if( p == NULL ) // On first track
8107  {
8108  // JKC: wxBell() is probably for accessibility, so a blind
8109  // user knows they were at the top track.
8110  wxBell();
8111  if( mCircularTrackNavigation )
8112  {
8113  TrackListIterator iter( mTracks );
8114  p = iter.Last();
8115  }
8116  else
8117  {
8118  EnsureVisible( t );
8119  return;
8120  }
8121  }
8122  tSelected = t->GetSelected();
8123  if (p)
8124  pSelected = p->GetSelected();
8125  if( tSelected && pSelected )
8126  {
8127  mTracks->Select( t, false );
8128  SetFocusedTrack( p ); // move focus to next track down
8129  EnsureVisible( p );
8130  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8131  return;
8132  }
8133  if( tSelected && !pSelected )
8134  {
8135  mTracks->Select( p, true );
8136  SetFocusedTrack( p ); // move focus to next track down
8137  EnsureVisible( p );
8138  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8139  return;
8140  }
8141  if( !tSelected && pSelected )
8142  {
8143  mTracks->Select( p, false );
8144  SetFocusedTrack( p ); // move focus to next track down
8145  EnsureVisible( p );
8146  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8147  return;
8148  }
8149  if( !tSelected && !pSelected )
8150  {
8151  mTracks->Select( t, true );
8152  SetFocusedTrack( p ); // move focus to next track down
8153  EnsureVisible( p );
8154  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8155  return;
8156  }
8157  }
8158  else
8159  {
8160  p = mTracks->GetPrev( t, true ); // Get next track
8161  if( p == NULL ) // On last track so stay there?
8162  {
8163  wxBell();
8164  if( mCircularTrackNavigation )
8165  {
8166  TrackListIterator iter( mTracks );
8167  for( Track *d = iter.First(); d; d = iter.Next( true ) )
8168  {
8169  p = d;
8170  }
8171  SetFocusedTrack( p ); // Wrap to the first track
8172  EnsureVisible( p );
8173  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8174  return;
8175  }
8176  else
8177  {
8178  EnsureVisible( t );
8179  return;
8180  }
8181  }
8182  else
8183  {
8184  SetFocusedTrack( p ); // move focus to next track down
8185  EnsureVisible( p );
8186  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8187  return;
8188  }
8189  }
8190 }
8191 
8195 void TrackPanel::OnNextTrack( bool shift )
8196 {
8197  Track *t;
8198  Track *n;
8199  TrackListIterator iter( mTracks );
8200  bool tSelected,nSelected;
8201 
8202  t = GetFocusedTrack(); // Get currently focused track
8203  if( t == NULL ) // if there isn't one, focus on first
8204  {
8205  t = iter.First();
8206  SetFocusedTrack( t );
8207  EnsureVisible( t );
8208  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8209  return;
8210  }
8211 
8212  if( shift )
8213  {
8214  n = mTracks->GetNext( t, true ); // Get next track
8215  if( n == NULL ) // On last track so stay there
8216  {
8217  wxBell();
8218  if( mCircularTrackNavigation )
8219  {
8220  TrackListIterator iter( mTracks );
8221  n = iter.First();
8222  }
8223  else
8224  {
8225  EnsureVisible( t );
8226  return;
8227  }
8228  }
8229  tSelected = t->GetSelected();
8230  nSelected = n->GetSelected();
8231  if( tSelected && nSelected )
8232  {
8233  mTracks->Select( t, false );
8234  SetFocusedTrack( n ); // move focus to next track down
8235  EnsureVisible( n );
8236  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8237  return;
8238  }
8239  if( tSelected && !nSelected )
8240  {
8241  mTracks->Select( n, true );
8242  SetFocusedTrack( n ); // move focus to next track down
8243  EnsureVisible( n );
8244  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8245  return;
8246  }
8247  if( !tSelected && nSelected )
8248  {
8249  mTracks->Select( n, false );
8250  SetFocusedTrack( n ); // move focus to next track down
8251  EnsureVisible( n );
8252  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8253  return;
8254  }
8255  if( !tSelected && !nSelected )
8256  {
8257  mTracks->Select( t, true );
8258  SetFocusedTrack( n ); // move focus to next track down
8259  EnsureVisible( n );
8260  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8261  return;
8262  }
8263  }
8264  else
8265  {
8266  n = mTracks->GetNext( t, true ); // Get next track
8267  if( n == NULL ) // On last track so stay there
8268  {
8269  wxBell();
8270  if( mCircularTrackNavigation )
8271  {
8272  TrackListIterator iter( mTracks );
8273  n = iter.First();
8274  SetFocusedTrack( n ); // Wrap to the first track
8275  EnsureVisible( n );
8276  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8277  return;
8278  }
8279  else
8280  {
8281  EnsureVisible( t );
8282  return;
8283  }
8284  }
8285  else
8286  {
8287  SetFocusedTrack( n ); // move focus to next track down
8288  EnsureVisible( n );
8289  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8290  return;
8291  }
8292  }
8293 }
8294 
8295 void TrackPanel::OnFirstTrack()
8296 {
8297  Track *t = GetFocusedTrack();
8298  if (!t)
8299  return;
8300 
8301  TrackListIterator iter(mTracks);
8302  Track *f = iter.First();
8303  if (t != f)
8304  {
8305  SetFocusedTrack(f);
8306  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8307  }
8308  EnsureVisible(f);
8309 }
8310 
8311 void TrackPanel::OnLastTrack()
8312 {
8313  Track *t = GetFocusedTrack();
8314  if (!t)
8315  return;
8316 
8317  TrackListIterator iter(mTracks);
8318  Track *l = iter.Last();
8319  if (t != l)
8320  {
8321  SetFocusedTrack(l);
8322  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8323  }
8324  EnsureVisible(l);
8325 }
8326 
8327 void TrackPanel::OnToggle()
8328 {
8329  Track *t;
8330 
8331  t = GetFocusedTrack(); // Get currently focused track
8332  if (!t)
8333  return;
8334 
8335  mTracks->Select( t, !t->GetSelected() );
8336  EnsureVisible( t );
8337  MakeParentModifyState(false);
8338 
8339  mAx->Updated();
8340 
8341  return;
8342 }
8343 
8344 // Make sure selection edge is in view
8345 void TrackPanel::ScrollIntoView(double pos)
8346 {
8347  int w;
8348  GetTracksUsableArea( &w, NULL );
8349 
8350  int pixel = mViewInfo->TimeToPosition(pos);
8351  if (pixel < 0 || pixel >= w)
8352  {
8353  mListener->TP_ScrollWindow
8354  (mViewInfo->OffsetTimeByPixels(pos, -(w / 2)));
8355  Refresh(false);
8356  }
8357 }
8358 
8359 void TrackPanel::ScrollIntoView(int x)
8360 {
8361  ScrollIntoView(mViewInfo->PositionToTime(x, GetLeftOffset()));
8362 }
8363 
8364 void TrackPanel::OnTrackMenu(Track *t)
8365 {
8366  if(!t) {
8367  t = GetFocusedTrack();
8368  if(!t) return;
8369  }
8370 
8371  mPopupMenuTarget = t;
8372 
8373  Track *next = mTracks->GetNext(t);
8374 
8375  wxMenu *theMenu = NULL;
8376  if (t->GetKind() == Track::Time) {
8377  theMenu = mTimeTrackMenu;
8378 
8379  TimeTrack *tt = (TimeTrack*) t;
8380 
8381  theMenu->Enable(OnTimeTrackLinID, tt->GetDisplayLog());
8382  theMenu->Enable(OnTimeTrackLogID, !tt->GetDisplayLog());
8383  theMenu->Check(OnTimeTrackLogIntID, tt->GetInterpolateLog());
8384  }
8385 
8386  if (t->GetKind() == Track::Wave) {
8387  theMenu = mWaveTrackMenu;
8388  const bool isMono = !t->GetLinked();
8389  const bool canMakeStereo =
8390  (next && isMono && !next->GetLinked() &&
8391  next->GetKind() == Track::Wave);
8392 
8393  theMenu->Enable(OnSwapChannelsID, t->GetLinked());
8394  theMenu->Enable(OnMergeStereoID, canMakeStereo);
8395  theMenu->Enable(OnSplitStereoID, t->GetLinked());
8396  theMenu->Enable(OnSplitStereoMonoID, t->GetLinked());
8397 
8398  // We only need to set check marks. Clearing checks causes problems on Linux (bug 851)
8399  // + Setting unchecked items to false is to get round a linux bug
8400  switch (t->GetChannel()) {
8401  case Track::LeftChannel:
8402  theMenu->Check(OnChannelLeftID, true);
8403  theMenu->Check(OnChannelRightID, false);
8404  theMenu->Check(OnChannelMonoID, false);
8405  break;
8406  case Track::RightChannel:
8407  theMenu->Check(OnChannelRightID, true);
8408  theMenu->Check(OnChannelLeftID, false);
8409  theMenu->Check(OnChannelMonoID, false);
8410  break;
8411  default:
8412  theMenu->Check(OnChannelMonoID, true);
8413  theMenu->Check(OnChannelLeftID, false);
8414  theMenu->Check(OnChannelRightID, false);
8415  }
8416 
8417  theMenu->Enable(OnChannelMonoID, !t->GetLinked());
8418  theMenu->Enable(OnChannelLeftID, !t->GetLinked());
8419  theMenu->Enable(OnChannelRightID, !t->GetLinked());
8420 
8421  WaveTrack *const track = (WaveTrack *)t;
8422  const int display = track->GetDisplay();
8423  theMenu->Check(
8424  (display == WaveTrack::Waveform)
8425  ? (track->GetWaveformSettings().isLinear() ? OnWaveformID : OnWaveformDBID)
8426  : OnSpectrumID,
8427  true
8428  );
8429  theMenu->Enable(OnSpectrogramSettingsID, display == WaveTrack::Spectrum);
8430 
8431  SetMenuCheck(*mRateMenu, IdOfRate((int) track->GetRate()));
8432  SetMenuCheck(*mFormatMenu, IdOfFormat(track->GetSampleFormat()));
8433 
8434  bool unsafe = IsUnsafe();
8435  for (int i = OnRate8ID; i <= OnFloatID; i++) {
8436  theMenu->Enable(i, !unsafe);
8437  }
8438  }
8439 
8440 #if defined(USE_MIDI)
8441  if (t->GetKind() == Track::Note)
8442  theMenu = mNoteTrackMenu;
8443 #endif
8444 
8445  if (t->GetKind() == Track::Label){
8446  theMenu = mLabelTrackMenu;
8447  }
8448 
8449  if (theMenu) {
8450  theMenu->Enable(OnMoveUpID, mTracks->CanMoveUp(t));
8451  theMenu->Enable(OnMoveDownID, mTracks->CanMoveDown(t));
8452  theMenu->Enable(OnMoveTopID, mTracks->CanMoveUp(t));
8453  theMenu->Enable(OnMoveBottomID, mTracks->CanMoveDown(t));
8454 
8455  //We need to find the location of the menu rectangle.
8456  wxRect rect = FindTrackRect(t,true);
8457  wxRect titleRect;
8458  mTrackInfo.GetTitleBarRect(rect,titleRect);
8459 
8460  PopupMenu(theMenu, titleRect.x + 1,
8461  titleRect.y + titleRect.height + 1);
8462  }
8463 
8464  mPopupMenuTarget = NULL;
8465 
8466  SetCapturedTrack(NULL);
8467 
8468  Refresh(false);
8469 }
8470 
8471 void TrackPanel::OnVRulerMenu(Track *t, wxMouseEvent *pEvent)
8472 {
8473  if (!t) {
8474  t = GetFocusedTrack();
8475  if (!t)
8476  return;
8477  }
8478 
8479  if (t->GetKind() != Track::Wave)
8480  return;
8481 
8482  WaveTrack *const wt = static_cast<WaveTrack*>(t);
8483 
8484  const int display = wt->GetDisplay();
8485  wxMenu *theMenu;
8486  if (display == WaveTrack::Waveform) {
8487  theMenu = mRulerWaveformMenu;
8488  const int id =
8489  OnFirstWaveformScaleID + int(wt->GetWaveformSettings().scaleType);
8490  theMenu->Check(id, true);
8491  }
8492  else {
8493  theMenu = mRulerSpectrumMenu;
8494  const int id =
8495  OnFirstSpectrumScaleID + int(wt->GetSpectrogramSettings().scaleType);
8496  theMenu->Check(id, true);
8497  }
8498 
8499  int x, y;
8500  if (pEvent)
8501  x = pEvent->m_x, y = pEvent->m_y;
8502  else {
8503  // If no event given, pop up the menu at the same height
8504  // as for the track control menu
8505  const wxRect rect = FindTrackRect(wt, true);
8506  wxRect titleRect;
8507  mTrackInfo.GetTitleBarRect(rect, titleRect);
8508  x = GetVRulerOffset(), y = titleRect.y + titleRect.height + 1;
8509  }
8510 
8511  // So that IsDragZooming() returns false, and if we zoom in, we do so
8512  // centered where the mouse is now:
8513  mZoomStart = mZoomEnd = pEvent->m_y;
8514 
8515  mPopupMenuTarget = wt;
8516  PopupMenu(theMenu, x, y);
8517  mPopupMenuTarget = NULL;
8518 }
8519 
8520 
8521 Track * TrackPanel::GetFirstSelectedTrack()
8522 {
8523 
8524  TrackListIterator iter(mTracks);
8525 
8526  Track * t;
8527  for ( t = iter.First();t!=NULL;t=iter.Next())
8528  {
8529  //Find the first selected track
8530  if(t->GetSelected())
8531  {
8532  return t;
8533  }
8534 
8535  }
8536  //if nothing is selected, return the first track
8537  t = iter.First();
8538 
8539  if(t)
8540  return t;
8541  else
8542  return NULL;
8543 }
8544 
8545 void TrackPanel::EnsureVisible(Track * t)
8546 {
8547  TrackListIterator iter(mTracks);
8548  Track *it = NULL;
8549  Track *nt = NULL;
8550 
8551  SetFocusedTrack(t);
8552 
8553  int trackTop = 0;
8554  int trackHeight =0;
8555 
8556  for (it = iter.First(); it; it = iter.Next()) {
8557  trackTop += trackHeight;
8558  trackHeight = it->GetHeight();
8559 
8560  //find the second track if this is stereo
8561  if (it->GetLinked()) {
8562  nt = iter.Next();
8563  trackHeight += nt->GetHeight();
8564  }
8565 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
8566  else if(MONO_WAVE_PAN(it)){
8567  trackHeight += it->GetHeight(true);
8568  }
8569 #endif
8570  else {
8571  nt = it;
8572  }
8573 
8574  //We have found the track we want to ensure is visible.
8575  if ((it == t) || (nt == t)) {
8576 
8577  //Get the size of the trackpanel.
8578  int width, height;
8579  GetSize(&width, &height);
8580 
8581  if (trackTop < mViewInfo->vpos) {
8582  height = mViewInfo->vpos - trackTop + mViewInfo->scrollStep;
8583  height /= mViewInfo->scrollStep;
8584  mListener->TP_ScrollUpDown(-height);
8585  }
8586  else if (trackTop + trackHeight > mViewInfo->vpos + height) {
8587  height = (trackTop + trackHeight) - (mViewInfo->vpos + height);
8588  height = (height + mViewInfo->scrollStep + 1) / mViewInfo->scrollStep;
8589  mListener->TP_ScrollUpDown(height);
8590  }
8591 
8592  break;
8593  }
8594  }
8595  Refresh(false);
8596 }
8597 
8598 void TrackPanel::DrawBordersAroundTrack(Track * t, wxDC * dc,
8599  const wxRect & rect, const int vrul,
8600  const int labelw)
8601 {
8602  // Border around track and label area
8603  dc->SetBrush(*wxTRANSPARENT_BRUSH);
8604  dc->SetPen(*wxBLACK_PEN);
8605  dc->DrawRectangle(rect.x, rect.y, rect.width - 1, rect.height - 1);
8606 
8607  AColor::Line(*dc, labelw, rect.y, labelw, rect.y + rect.height - 1); // between vruler and TrackInfo
8608 
8609  // The lines at bottom of 1st track and top of second track of stereo group
8610  // Possibly replace with DrawRectangle to add left border.
8611 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
8612  if (t->GetLinked() || MONO_WAVE_PAN(t)) {
8613  int h1 = rect.y + t->GetHeight() - kTopInset;
8614  AColor::Line(*dc, vrul, h1 - 2, rect.x + rect.width - 1, h1 - 2);
8615  AColor::Line(*dc, vrul, h1 + kTopInset, rect.x + rect.width - 1, h1 + kTopInset);
8616  }
8617 #else
8618  if (t->GetLinked()) {
8619  // The given rect has had the top inset subtracted
8620  int h1 = rect.y + t->GetHeight() - kTopInset;
8621  // h1 is the top coordinate of the second tracks' rectangle
8622  // Draw (part of) the bottom border of the top channel and top border of the bottom
8623  AColor::Line(*dc, vrul, h1 - kBottomMargin, rect.x + rect.width - 1, h1 - kBottomMargin);
8624  AColor::Line(*dc, vrul, h1 + kTopInset, rect.x + rect.width - 1, h1 + kTopInset);
8625  }
8626 #endif
8627 }
8628 
8629 void TrackPanel::DrawShadow(Track * /* t */ , wxDC * dc, const wxRect & rect)
8630 {
8631  int right = rect.x + rect.width - 1;
8632  int bottom = rect.y + rect.height - 1;
8633 
8634  // shadow
8635  dc->SetPen(*wxBLACK_PEN);
8636 
8637  // bottom
8638  AColor::Line(*dc, rect.x, bottom, right, bottom);
8639  // right
8640  AColor::Line(*dc, right, rect.y, right, bottom);
8641 
8642  // background
8643  AColor::Dark(dc, false);
8644 
8645  // bottom
8646  AColor::Line(*dc, rect.x, bottom, rect.x + 1, bottom);
8647  // right
8648  AColor::Line(*dc, right, rect.y, right, rect.y + 1);
8649 }
8650 
8654 wxString TrackPanel::TrackSubText(Track * t)
8655 {
8656  wxString s = wxString::Format(wxT("%dHz"),
8657  (int) (((WaveTrack *) t)->GetRate() +
8658  0.5));
8659 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
8660  if (t->GetLinked() && t->GetChannel() != Track::MonoChannel)
8661  s = _("Stereo, ") + s;
8662 #else
8663  if (t->GetLinked())
8664  s = _("Stereo, ") + s;
8665 #endif
8666  else {
8667  if (t->GetChannel() == Track::MonoChannel)
8668  s = _("Mono, ") + s;
8669  else if (t->GetChannel() == Track::LeftChannel)
8670  s = _("Left, ") + s;
8671  else if (t->GetChannel() == Track::RightChannel)
8672  s = _("Right, ") + s;
8673  }
8674 
8675  return s;
8676 }
8677 
8680 static int channels[] = { Track::LeftChannel, Track::RightChannel,
8681  Track::MonoChannel
8682 };
8683 
8684 static const wxChar *channelmsgs[] = { _("Left Channel"), _("Right Channel"),
8685  _("Mono")
8686 };
8687 
8688 void TrackPanel::OnChannelChange(wxCommandEvent & event)
8689 {
8690  int id = event.GetId();
8691  wxASSERT(id >= OnChannelLeftID && id <= OnChannelMonoID);
8692  wxASSERT(mPopupMenuTarget);
8693  mPopupMenuTarget->SetChannel(channels[id - OnChannelLeftID]);
8694  MakeParentPushState(wxString::Format(_("Changed '%s' to %s"),
8695  mPopupMenuTarget->GetName().c_str(),
8696  channelmsgs[id - OnChannelLeftID]),
8697  _("Channel"));
8698  Refresh(false);
8699 }
8700 
8702 void TrackPanel::OnSwapChannels(wxCommandEvent & WXUNUSED(event))
8703 {
8704  Track *partner = mPopupMenuTarget->GetLink();
8705  Track *const focused = GetFocusedTrack();
8706  const bool hasFocus =
8707  (focused == mPopupMenuTarget || focused == partner);
8708 
8709  SplitStereo(true);
8710  mPopupMenuTarget->SetChannel(Track::RightChannel);
8711  partner->SetChannel(Track::LeftChannel);
8712 
8713  (mTracks->MoveUp(partner));
8714  partner->SetLinked(true);
8715 
8716  MixerBoard* pMixerBoard = this->GetMixerBoard();
8717  if (pMixerBoard) {
8718  pMixerBoard->UpdateTrackClusters();
8719  }
8720 
8721  if (hasFocus)
8722  SetFocusedTrack(partner);
8723 
8724  MakeParentPushState(wxString::Format(_("Swapped Channels in '%s'"),
8725  mPopupMenuTarget->GetName().c_str()),
8726  _("Swap Channels"));
8727 
8728 }
8729 
8731 void TrackPanel::OnSplitStereo(wxCommandEvent & WXUNUSED(event))
8732 {
8733  SplitStereo(true);
8734  MakeParentPushState(wxString::Format(_("Split stereo track '%s'"),
8735  mPopupMenuTarget->GetName().c_str()),
8736  _("Split"));
8737 }
8738 
8740 void TrackPanel::OnSplitStereoMono(wxCommandEvent & WXUNUSED(event))
8741 {
8742  SplitStereo(false);
8743  MakeParentPushState(wxString::Format(_("Split Stereo to Mono '%s'"),
8744  mPopupMenuTarget->GetName().c_str()),
8745  _("Split to Mono"));
8746 }
8747 
8749 void TrackPanel::SplitStereo(bool stereo)
8750 {
8751  wxASSERT(mPopupMenuTarget);
8752 
8753  if (!stereo)
8754  mPopupMenuTarget->SetChannel(Track::MonoChannel);
8755 
8756  Track *partner = mPopupMenuTarget->GetLink();
8757 
8758 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
8759  if(!stereo && MONO_WAVE_PAN(mPopupMenuTarget))
8760  ((WaveTrack*)mPopupMenuTarget)->SetVirtualState(true,true);
8761  if(!stereo && MONO_WAVE_PAN(partner))
8762  ((WaveTrack*)partner)->SetVirtualState(true,true);
8763 #endif
8764 
8765  if (partner)
8766  {
8767  partner->SetName(mPopupMenuTarget->GetName());
8768  if (!stereo)
8769  partner->SetChannel(Track::MonoChannel); // Keep original stereo track name.
8770 
8771  //On Demand - have each channel add it's own.
8772  if (ODManager::IsInstanceCreated() && partner->GetKind() == Track::Wave)
8773  ODManager::Instance()->MakeWaveTrackIndependent((WaveTrack*)partner);
8774  }
8775 
8776  mPopupMenuTarget->SetLinked(false);
8777  //make sure neither track is smaller than its minimum height
8778  if (mPopupMenuTarget->GetHeight() < mPopupMenuTarget->GetMinimizedHeight())
8779  mPopupMenuTarget->SetHeight(mPopupMenuTarget->GetMinimizedHeight());
8780  if (partner)
8781  {
8782  if (partner->GetHeight() < partner->GetMinimizedHeight())
8783  partner->SetHeight(partner->GetMinimizedHeight());
8784 
8785  // Make tracks the same height
8786  if (mPopupMenuTarget->GetHeight() != partner->GetHeight())
8787  {
8788  mPopupMenuTarget->SetHeight(((mPopupMenuTarget->GetHeight())+(partner->GetHeight())) / 2.0);
8789  partner->SetHeight(mPopupMenuTarget->GetHeight());
8790  }
8791  }
8792 
8793  Refresh(false);
8794 }
8795 
8797 void TrackPanel::OnMergeStereo(wxCommandEvent & WXUNUSED(event))
8798 {
8799  wxASSERT(mPopupMenuTarget);
8800  mPopupMenuTarget->SetLinked(true);
8801  Track *partner = mPopupMenuTarget->GetLink();
8802 
8803 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
8804  if(MONO_WAVE_PAN(mPopupMenuTarget))
8805  ((WaveTrack*)mPopupMenuTarget)->SetVirtualState(false);
8806  if(MONO_WAVE_PAN(partner))
8807  ((WaveTrack*)partner)->SetVirtualState(false);
8808 #endif
8809 
8810  if (partner) {
8811  // Set partner's parameters to match target.
8812  partner->Merge(*mPopupMenuTarget);
8813 
8814  mPopupMenuTarget->SetChannel(Track::LeftChannel);
8815  partner->SetChannel(Track::RightChannel);
8816 
8817  // Set NEW track heights and minimized state
8818  bool bBothMinimizedp=((mPopupMenuTarget->GetMinimized())&&(partner->GetMinimized()));
8819  mPopupMenuTarget->SetMinimized(false);
8820  partner->SetMinimized(false);
8821  int AverageHeight=(mPopupMenuTarget->GetHeight() + partner->GetHeight())/ 2;
8822  mPopupMenuTarget->SetHeight(AverageHeight);
8823  partner->SetHeight(AverageHeight);
8824  mPopupMenuTarget->SetMinimized(bBothMinimizedp);
8825  partner->SetMinimized(bBothMinimizedp);
8826 
8827  //On Demand - join the queues together.
8828  if(ODManager::IsInstanceCreated() && partner->GetKind() == Track::Wave && mPopupMenuTarget->GetKind() == Track::Wave )
8829  if(!ODManager::Instance()->MakeWaveTrackDependent((WaveTrack*)partner,(WaveTrack*)mPopupMenuTarget))
8830  {
8831  ;
8832  //TODO: in the future, we will have to check the return value of MakeWaveTrackDependent -
8833  //if the tracks cannot merge, it returns false, and in that case we should not allow a merging.
8834  //for example it returns false when there are two different types of ODTasks on each track's queue.
8835  //we will need to display this to the user.
8836  }
8837 
8838  MakeParentPushState(wxString::Format(_("Made '%s' a stereo track"),
8839  mPopupMenuTarget->GetName().
8840  c_str()),
8841  _("Make Stereo"));
8842  } else
8843  mPopupMenuTarget->SetLinked(false);
8844 
8845  Refresh(false);
8846 }
8847 
8848 class ViewSettingsDialog final : public PrefsDialog
8849 {
8850 public:
8851  ViewSettingsDialog
8852  (wxWindow *parent, const wxString &title, PrefsDialog::Factories &factories,
8853  int page)
8854  : PrefsDialog(parent, title, factories)
8855  , mPage(page)
8856  {
8857  }
8858 
8859  long GetPreferredPage() override
8860  {
8861  return mPage;
8862  }
8863 
8864  void SavePreferredPage() override
8865  {
8866  }
8867 
8868 private:
8869  const int mPage;
8870 };
8871 
8872 void TrackPanel::OnSpectrogramSettings(wxCommandEvent &)
8873 {
8874  WaveTrack *const wt = static_cast<WaveTrack*>(mPopupMenuTarget);
8875  // WaveformPrefsFactory waveformFactory(wt);
8876  SpectrumPrefsFactory spectrumFactory(wt);
8877 
8878  PrefsDialog::Factories factories;
8879  // factories.push_back(&waveformFactory);
8880  factories.push_back(&spectrumFactory);
8881  const int page = (wt->GetDisplay() == WaveTrack::Spectrum)
8882  ? 1 : 0;
8883 
8884  wxString title(wt->GetName() + wxT(": "));
8885  ViewSettingsDialog dialog(this, title, factories, page);
8886 
8887  if (0 != dialog.ShowModal())
8888  // Redraw
8889  Refresh(false);
8890 }
8891 
8896 void TrackPanel::OnSetDisplay(wxCommandEvent & event)
8897 {
8898  int idInt = event.GetId();
8899  wxASSERT(idInt >= OnWaveformID && idInt <= OnSpectrumID);
8900  wxASSERT(mPopupMenuTarget
8901  && mPopupMenuTarget->GetKind() == Track::Wave);
8902 
8903  bool linear = false;
8904  WaveTrack::WaveTrackDisplay id;
8905  switch (idInt) {
8906  default:
8907  case OnWaveformID:
8908  linear = true, id = WaveTrack::Waveform; break;
8909  case OnWaveformDBID:
8910  id = WaveTrack::Waveform; break;
8911  case OnSpectrumID:
8912  id = WaveTrack::Spectrum; break;
8913  }
8914  WaveTrack *wt = (WaveTrack *) mPopupMenuTarget;
8915  const bool wrongType = wt->GetDisplay() != id;
8916  const bool wrongScale =
8917  (id == WaveTrack::Waveform &&
8918  wt->GetWaveformSettings().isLinear() != linear);
8919  if (wrongType || wrongScale) {
8920  wt->SetLastScaleType();
8921  wt->SetDisplay(WaveTrack::WaveTrackDisplay(id));
8922  if (wrongScale)
8923  wt->GetIndependentWaveformSettings().scaleType = linear
8924  ? WaveformSettings::stLinear
8925  : WaveformSettings::stLogarithmic;
8926 
8927  WaveTrack *l = static_cast<WaveTrack *>(wt->GetLink());
8928  if (l) {
8929  l->SetLastScaleType();
8930  l->SetDisplay(WaveTrack::WaveTrackDisplay(id));
8931  if (wrongScale)
8932  l->GetIndependentWaveformSettings().scaleType = linear
8933  ? WaveformSettings::stLinear
8934  : WaveformSettings::stLogarithmic;
8935  }
8936 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
8937  if (wt->GetDisplay() == WaveTrack::WaveformDisplay) {
8938  wt->SetVirtualState(false);
8939  }else if (id == WaveTrack::WaveformDisplay) {
8940  wt->SetVirtualState(true);
8941  }
8942 #endif
8943  UpdateVRuler(wt);
8944 
8945  MakeParentModifyState(true);
8946  Refresh(false);
8947  }
8948 }
8949 
8952 void TrackPanel::SetRate(Track * pTrack, double rate)
8953 {
8954  ((WaveTrack *) pTrack)->SetRate(rate);
8955  Track *partner = mTracks->GetLink(pTrack);
8956  if (partner)
8957  ((WaveTrack *) partner)->SetRate(rate);
8958  // Separate conversion of "rate" enables changing the decimals without affecting i18n
8959  wxString rateString = wxString::Format(wxT("%.3f"), rate);
8960  MakeParentPushState(wxString::Format(_("Changed '%s' to %s Hz"),
8961  pTrack->GetName().c_str(), rateString.c_str()),
8962  _("Rate Change"));
8963 }
8964 
8967 void TrackPanel::OnFormatChange(wxCommandEvent & event)
8968 {
8969  int id = event.GetId();
8970  wxASSERT(id >= On16BitID && id <= OnFloatID);
8971  wxASSERT(mPopupMenuTarget
8972  && mPopupMenuTarget->GetKind() == Track::Wave);
8973 
8974  sampleFormat newFormat = int16Sample;
8975 
8976  switch (id) {
8977  case On16BitID:
8978  newFormat = int16Sample;
8979  break;
8980  case On24BitID:
8981  newFormat = int24Sample;
8982  break;
8983  case OnFloatID:
8984  newFormat = floatSample;
8985  break;
8986  default:
8987  // ERROR -- should not happen
8988  wxASSERT(false);
8989  break;
8990  }
8991  if (newFormat == ((WaveTrack*)mPopupMenuTarget)->GetSampleFormat())
8992  return; // Nothing to do.
8993 
8994  bool bResult = ((WaveTrack*)mPopupMenuTarget)->ConvertToSampleFormat(newFormat);
8995  wxASSERT(bResult); // TO DO: Actually handle this.
8996  Track *partner = mTracks->GetLink(mPopupMenuTarget);
8997  if (partner)
8998  {
8999  bResult = ((WaveTrack*)partner)->ConvertToSampleFormat(newFormat);
9000  wxASSERT(bResult); // TO DO: Actually handle this.
9001  }
9002 
9003  MakeParentPushState(wxString::Format(_("Changed '%s' to %s"),
9004  mPopupMenuTarget->GetName().
9005  c_str(),
9006  GetSampleFormatStr(newFormat)),
9007  _("Format Change"));
9008 
9009  SetMenuCheck( *mFormatMenu, id );
9010  MakeParentRedrawScrollbars();
9011  Refresh(false);
9012 }
9013 
9015 int TrackPanel::IdOfFormat( int format )
9016 {
9017  switch (format) {
9018  case int16Sample:
9019  return On16BitID;
9020  case int24Sample:
9021  return On24BitID;
9022  case floatSample:
9023  return OnFloatID;
9024  default:
9025  // ERROR -- should not happen
9026  wxASSERT( false );
9027  break;
9028  }
9029  return OnFloatID;// Compiler food.
9030 }
9031 
9033 void TrackPanel::SetMenuCheck( wxMenu & menu, int newId )
9034 {
9035  wxMenuItemList & list = menu.GetMenuItems();
9036  wxMenuItem * item;
9037  int id;
9038 
9039  for ( wxMenuItemList::compatibility_iterator node = list.GetFirst(); node; node = node->GetNext() )
9040  {
9041  item = node->GetData();
9042  id = item->GetId();
9043  // We only need to set check marks. Clearing checks causes problems on Linux (bug 851)
9044  if (id==newId)
9045  menu.Check( id, true );
9046  }
9047 }
9048 
9049 const int nRates=12;
9050 
9053 static int gRates[nRates] = { 8000, 11025, 16000, 22050, 44100, 48000, 88200, 96000,
9054  176400, 192000, 352800, 384000 };
9055 
9058 void TrackPanel::OnRateChange(wxCommandEvent & event)
9059 {
9060  int id = event.GetId();
9061  wxASSERT(id >= OnRate8ID && id <= OnRate384ID);
9062  wxASSERT(mPopupMenuTarget
9063  && mPopupMenuTarget->GetKind() == Track::Wave);
9064 
9065  SetMenuCheck( *mRateMenu, id );
9066  SetRate(mPopupMenuTarget, gRates[id - OnRate8ID]);
9067 
9068  MakeParentRedrawScrollbars();
9069 
9070  Refresh(false);
9071 }
9072 
9074 int TrackPanel::IdOfRate( int rate )
9075 {
9076  for(int i=0;i<nRates;i++) {
9077  if( gRates[i] == rate )
9078  return i+OnRate8ID;
9079  }
9080  return OnRateOtherID;
9081 }
9082 
9083 void TrackPanel::OnRateOther(wxCommandEvent &event)
9084 {
9085  wxASSERT(mPopupMenuTarget
9086  && mPopupMenuTarget->GetKind() == Track::Wave);
9087 
9088  int newRate;
9089 
9092  while (true)
9093  {
9094  wxDialog dlg(this, wxID_ANY, wxString(_("Set Rate")));
9095  dlg.SetName(dlg.GetTitle());
9096  ShuttleGui S(&dlg, eIsCreating);
9097  wxString rate;
9098  wxArrayString rates;
9099  wxComboBox *cb;
9100 
9101  rate.Printf(wxT("%ld"), lrint(((WaveTrack *) mPopupMenuTarget)->GetRate()));
9102 
9103  rates.Add(wxT("8000"));
9104  rates.Add(wxT("11025"));
9105  rates.Add(wxT("16000"));
9106  rates.Add(wxT("22050"));
9107  rates.Add(wxT("44100"));
9108  rates.Add(wxT("48000"));
9109  rates.Add(wxT("88200"));
9110  rates.Add(wxT("96000"));
9111  rates.Add(wxT("176400"));
9112  rates.Add(wxT("192000"));
9113  rates.Add(wxT("352800"));
9114  rates.Add(wxT("384000"));
9115 
9116  S.StartVerticalLay(true);
9117  {
9118  S.SetBorder(10);
9119  S.StartHorizontalLay(wxEXPAND, false);
9120  {
9121  cb = S.AddCombo(_("New sample rate (Hz):"),
9122  rate,
9123  &rates);
9124 #if defined(__WXMAC__)
9125  // As of wxMac-2.8.12, setting manually is required
9126  // to handle rates not in the list. See: Bug #427
9127  cb->SetValue(rate);
9128 #endif
9129  }
9130  S.EndHorizontalLay();
9131  S.AddStandardButtons();
9132  }
9133  S.EndVerticalLay();
9134 
9135  dlg.SetClientSize(dlg.GetSizer()->CalcMin());
9136  dlg.Center();
9137 
9138  if (dlg.ShowModal() != wxID_OK)
9139  {
9140  return; // user cancelled dialog
9141  }
9142 
9143  long lrate;
9144  if (cb->GetValue().ToLong(&lrate) && lrate >= 1 && lrate <= 1000000)
9145  {
9146  newRate = (int)lrate;
9147  break;
9148  }
9149 
9150  wxMessageBox(_("The entered value is invalid"), _("Error"),
9151  wxICON_ERROR, this);
9152  }
9153 
9154  SetMenuCheck( *mRateMenu, event.GetId() );
9155  SetRate(mPopupMenuTarget, newRate);
9156 
9157  MakeParentRedrawScrollbars();
9158  Refresh(false);
9159 }
9160 
9161 void TrackPanel::OnSetTimeTrackRange(wxCommandEvent & /*event*/)
9162 {
9163  TimeTrack *t = (TimeTrack*)mPopupMenuTarget;
9164 
9165  if (t) {
9166  long lower = (long) (t->GetRangeLower() * 100.0 + 0.5);
9167  long upper = (long) (t->GetRangeUpper() * 100.0 + 0.5);
9168 
9169  // MB: these lower/upper limits match the maximum allowed range of the time track
9170  // envelope, but this is not strictly required
9171  lower = wxGetNumberFromUser(_("Change lower speed limit (%) to:"),
9172  _("Lower speed limit"),
9173  _("Lower speed limit"),
9174  lower,
9175  10,
9176  1000);
9177 
9178  upper = wxGetNumberFromUser(_("Change upper speed limit (%) to:"),
9179  _("Upper speed limit"),
9180  _("Upper speed limit"),
9181  upper,
9182  lower+1,
9183  1000);
9184 
9185  if( lower >= 10 && upper <= 1000 && lower < upper ) {
9186  t->SetRangeLower((double)lower / 100.0);
9187  t->SetRangeUpper((double)upper / 100.0);
9188  MakeParentPushState(wxString::Format(_("Set range to '%ld' - '%ld'"),
9189  lower,
9190  upper),
9191  /* i18n-hint: (verb)*/
9192 
9193  _("Set Range"));
9194  Refresh(false);
9195  }
9196  }
9197 }
9198 
9199 void TrackPanel::OnTimeTrackLin(wxCommandEvent & /*event*/)
9200 {
9201  TimeTrack *t = (TimeTrack*)mPopupMenuTarget;
9202  t->SetDisplayLog(false);
9203  UpdateVRuler(t);
9204  MakeParentPushState(_("Set time track display to linear"), _("Set Display"));
9205  Refresh(false);
9206 }
9207 
9208 void TrackPanel::OnTimeTrackLog(wxCommandEvent & /*event*/)
9209 {
9210  TimeTrack *t = (TimeTrack*)mPopupMenuTarget;
9211  t->SetDisplayLog(true);
9212  UpdateVRuler(t);
9213  MakeParentPushState(_("Set time track display to logarithmic"), _("Set Display"));
9214  Refresh(false);
9215 }
9216 
9217 void TrackPanel::OnTimeTrackLogInt(wxCommandEvent & /*event*/)
9218 {
9219  TimeTrack *t = (TimeTrack*)mPopupMenuTarget;
9220  if(t->GetInterpolateLog()) {
9221  t->SetInterpolateLog(false);
9222  MakeParentPushState(_("Set time track interpolation to linear"), _("Set Interpolation"));
9223  } else {
9224  t->SetInterpolateLog(true);
9225  MakeParentPushState(_("Set time track interpolation to logarithmic"), _("Set Interpolation"));
9226  }
9227  Refresh(false);
9228 }
9229 
9230 void TrackPanel::OnWaveformScaleType(wxCommandEvent &evt)
9231 {
9232  WaveTrack *const wt = static_cast<WaveTrack *>(mPopupMenuTarget);
9233  WaveTrack *const partner = static_cast<WaveTrack*>(wt->GetLink());
9234  const WaveformSettings::ScaleType newScaleType =
9235  WaveformSettings::ScaleType(
9236  std::max(0,
9237  std::min(int(WaveformSettings::stNumScaleTypes) - 1,
9238  evt.GetId() - OnFirstWaveformScaleID
9239  )));
9240  if (wt->GetWaveformSettings().scaleType != newScaleType) {
9241  wt->GetIndependentWaveformSettings().scaleType = newScaleType;
9242  if (partner)
9243  partner->GetIndependentWaveformSettings().scaleType = newScaleType;
9244  UpdateVRuler(wt); // Is this really needed?
9245  MakeParentModifyState(true);
9246  Refresh(false);
9247  }
9248 }
9249 
9250 void TrackPanel::OnSpectrumScaleType(wxCommandEvent &evt)
9251 {
9252  WaveTrack *const wt = static_cast<WaveTrack *>(mPopupMenuTarget);
9253  WaveTrack *const partner = static_cast<WaveTrack*>(wt->GetLink());
9254  const SpectrogramSettings::ScaleType newScaleType =
9255  SpectrogramSettings::ScaleType(
9256  std::max(0,
9257  std::min(int(SpectrogramSettings::stNumScaleTypes) - 1,
9258  evt.GetId() - OnFirstSpectrumScaleID
9259  )));
9260  if (wt->GetSpectrogramSettings().scaleType != newScaleType) {
9261  wt->GetIndependentSpectrogramSettings().scaleType = newScaleType;
9262  if (partner)
9263  partner->GetIndependentSpectrogramSettings().scaleType = newScaleType;
9264  UpdateVRuler(wt); // Is this really needed?
9265  MakeParentModifyState(true);
9266  Refresh(false);
9267  }
9268 }
9269 
9270 void TrackPanel::OnZoomInVertical(wxCommandEvent &)
9271 {
9272  HandleWaveTrackVZoom(static_cast<WaveTrack*>(mPopupMenuTarget), false, false);
9273 }
9274 
9275 void TrackPanel::OnZoomOutVertical(wxCommandEvent &)
9276 {
9277  HandleWaveTrackVZoom(static_cast<WaveTrack*>(mPopupMenuTarget), true, false);
9278 }
9279 
9280 void TrackPanel::OnZoomFitVertical(wxCommandEvent &)
9281 {
9282  HandleWaveTrackVZoom(static_cast<WaveTrack*>(mPopupMenuTarget), true, true);
9283 }

9286 
9287 void TrackPanel::OnMoveTrack(wxCommandEvent &event)
9288 {
9289  AudacityProject::MoveChoice choice;
9290  switch (event.GetId()) {
9291  default:
9292  wxASSERT(false);
9293  case OnMoveUpID:
9294  choice = AudacityProject::OnMoveUpID; break;
9295  case OnMoveDownID:
9296  choice = AudacityProject::OnMoveDownID; break;
9297  case OnMoveTopID:
9298  choice = AudacityProject::OnMoveTopID; break;
9299  case OnMoveBottomID:
9300  choice = AudacityProject::OnMoveBottomID; break;
9301  }
9302 
9303  GetProject()->MoveTrack(mPopupMenuTarget, choice);
9304 }
9305 
9308 void TrackPanel::OnChangeOctave(wxCommandEvent & event)
9309 {
9310 #if defined(USE_MIDI)
9311  wxASSERT(event.GetId() == OnUpOctaveID
9312  || event.GetId() == OnDownOctaveID);
9313  wxASSERT(mPopupMenuTarget->GetKind() == Track::Note);
9314  NoteTrack *t = (NoteTrack *) mPopupMenuTarget;
9315 
9316  bool bDown = (OnDownOctaveID == event.GetId());
9317  t->SetBottomNote(t->GetBottomNote() + ((bDown) ? -12 : 12));
9318 
9319  MakeParentModifyState(true);
9320  Refresh(false);
9321 #endif
9322 }
9323 
9324 void TrackPanel::OnSetName(wxCommandEvent & WXUNUSED(event))
9325 {
9326  Track *t = mPopupMenuTarget;
9327  if (t)
9328  {
9329  wxString oldName = t->GetName();
9330  wxString newName =
9331  wxGetTextFromUser(_("Change track name to:"),
9332  _("Track Name"), oldName);
9333  if (newName != wxT("")) // wxGetTextFromUser returns empty string on Cancel.
9334  {
9335  t->SetName(newName);
9336  // if we have a linked channel this name should change as well
9337  // (otherwise sort by name and time will crash).
9338  if (t->GetLinked())
9339  t->GetLink()->SetName(newName);
9340 
9341  MixerBoard* pMixerBoard = this->GetMixerBoard();
9342  if (pMixerBoard && (t->GetKind() == Track::Wave))
9343  pMixerBoard->UpdateName((WaveTrack*)t);
9344 
9345  MakeParentPushState(wxString::Format(_("Renamed '%s' to '%s'"),
9346  oldName.c_str(),
9347  newName.c_str()),
9348  _("Name Change"));
9349 
9350  Refresh(false);
9351  }
9352  }
9353 }
9354 
9355 // Small helper class to enumerate all fonts in the system
9356 // We use this because the default implementation of
9357 // wxFontEnumerator::GetFacenames() has changed between wx2.6 and 2.8
9358 class TrackPanelFontEnumerator final : public wxFontEnumerator
9359 {
9360 public:
9361  TrackPanelFontEnumerator(wxArrayString* fontNames) :
9362  mFontNames(fontNames) {}
9363 
9364  bool OnFacename(const wxString& font) override
9365  {
9366  mFontNames->Add(font);
9367  return true;
9368  }
9369 
9370 private:
9371  wxArrayString* mFontNames;
9372 };
9373 
9374 void TrackPanel::OnSetFont(wxCommandEvent & WXUNUSED(event))
9375 {
9376  wxArrayString facenames;
9377  TrackPanelFontEnumerator fontEnumerator(&facenames);
9378  fontEnumerator.EnumerateFacenames(wxFONTENCODING_SYSTEM, false);
9379 
9380  wxString facename = gPrefs->Read(wxT("/GUI/LabelFontFacename"), wxT(""));
9381  long fontsize = gPrefs->Read(wxT("/GUI/LabelFontSize"), 12);
9382 
9383  /* i18n-hint: (noun) This is the font for the label track.*/
9384  wxDialog dlg(this, wxID_ANY, wxString(_("Label Track Font")));
9385  dlg.SetName(dlg.GetTitle());
9386  ShuttleGui S(&dlg, eIsCreating);
9387  wxListBox *lb;
9388  wxSpinCtrl *sc;
9389 
9390  S.StartVerticalLay(true);
9391  {
9392  S.StartMultiColumn(2, wxEXPAND);
9393  {
9394  S.SetStretchyRow(0);
9395  S.SetStretchyCol(1);
9396 
9397  /* i18n-hint: (noun) The name of the typeface*/
9398  S.AddPrompt(_("Face name"));
9399  lb = safenew wxListBox(&dlg, wxID_ANY,
9400  wxDefaultPosition,
9401  wxDefaultSize,
9402  facenames,
9403  wxLB_SINGLE);
9404 
9405  lb->SetName(_("Face name"));
9406  lb->SetSelection(facenames.Index(facename));
9407  S.AddWindow(lb, wxALIGN_LEFT | wxEXPAND | wxALL);
9408 
9409  /* i18n-hint: (noun) The size of the typeface*/
9410  S.AddPrompt(_("Face size"));
9411  sc = safenew wxSpinCtrl(&dlg, wxID_ANY,
9412  wxString::Format(wxT("%ld"), fontsize),
9413  wxDefaultPosition,
9414  wxDefaultSize,
9415  wxSP_ARROW_KEYS,
9416  8, 48, fontsize);
9417  sc->SetName(_("Face size"));
9418  S.AddWindow(sc, wxALIGN_LEFT | wxALL);
9419  }
9420  S.EndMultiColumn();
9421  S.AddStandardButtons();
9422  }
9423  S.EndVerticalLay();
9424 
9425  dlg.Layout();
9426  dlg.Fit();
9427  dlg.CenterOnParent();
9428  if (dlg.ShowModal() == wxID_CANCEL) {
9429  return;
9430  }
9431 
9432  gPrefs->Write(wxT("/GUI/LabelFontFacename"), lb->GetStringSelection());
9433  gPrefs->Write(wxT("/GUI/LabelFontSize"), sc->GetValue());
9434  gPrefs->Flush();
9435 
9436  LabelTrack::ResetFont();
9437 
9438  Refresh(false);
9439 }
9440 
9447 Track *TrackPanel::FindTrack(int mouseX, int mouseY, bool label, bool link,
9448  wxRect * trackRect)
9449 {
9450  // If label is true, resulting rectangle OMITS left and top insets.
9451  // If label is false, resulting rectangle INCLUDES right and top insets.
9452 
9453  wxRect rect;
9454  rect.x = 0;
9455  rect.y = -mViewInfo->vpos;
9456  rect.y += kTopInset;
9457  GetSize(&rect.width, &rect.height);
9458 
9459  if (label) {
9460  rect.width = GetLeftOffset();
9461  } else {
9462  rect.x = GetLeftOffset();
9463  rect.width -= GetLeftOffset();
9464  }
9465 
9466  VisibleTrackIterator iter(GetProject());
9467  for (Track * t = iter.First(); t; t = iter.Next()) {
9468  rect.y = t->GetY() - mViewInfo->vpos + kTopInset;
9469  rect.height = t->GetHeight();
9470 
9471  if (link && t->GetLink()) {
9472  Track *l = t->GetLink();
9473  int h = l->GetHeight();
9474  if (!t->GetLinked()) {
9475  t = l;
9476  rect.y = t->GetY() - mViewInfo->vpos + kTopInset;
9477  }
9478  rect.height += h;
9479  }
9480 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
9481  else if(link && MONO_WAVE_PAN(t))
9482  {
9483  rect.height += t->GetHeight(true);
9484  }
9485 #endif
9486  //Determine whether the mouse is inside
9487  //the current rectangle. If so, recalculate
9488  //the proper dimensions and return.
9489  if (rect.Contains(mouseX, mouseY)) {
9490 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
9491  t->SetVirtualStereo(false);
9492 #endif
9493  if (trackRect) {
9494  rect.y -= kTopInset;
9495  if (label) {
9496  rect.x += kLeftInset;
9497  rect.width -= kLeftInset;
9498  rect.y += kTopInset;
9499  rect.height -= kTopInset;
9500  }
9501  *trackRect = rect;
9502  }
9503 
9504  return t;
9505  }
9506 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
9507  if(!link && MONO_WAVE_PAN(t)){
9508  rect.y = t->GetY(true) - mViewInfo->vpos + kTopInset;
9509  rect.height = t->GetHeight(true);
9510  if (rect.Contains(mouseX, mouseY)) {
9511  t->SetVirtualStereo(true);
9512  if (trackRect) {
9513  rect.y -= kTopInset;
9514  if (label) {
9515  rect.x += kLeftInset;
9516  rect.width -= kLeftInset;
9517  rect.y += kTopInset;
9518  rect.height -= kTopInset;
9519  }
9520  *trackRect = rect;
9521  }
9522  return t;
9523  }
9524  }
9525 #endif // EXPERIMENTAL_OUTPUT_DISPLAY
9526  }
9527 
9528  return NULL;
9529 }
9530 
9533 wxRect TrackPanel::FindTrackRect(Track * target, bool label)
9534 {
9535  if (!target) {
9536  return wxRect(0,0,0,0);
9537  }
9538 
9539  wxRect rect(0,
9540  target->GetY() - mViewInfo->vpos,
9541  GetSize().GetWidth(),
9542  target->GetHeight());
9543 
9544  // The check for a null linked track is necessary because there's
9545  // a possible race condition between the time the 2 linked tracks
9546  // are added and when wxAccessible methods are called. This is
9547  // most evident when using Jaws.
9548  if (target->GetLinked() && target->GetLink()) {
9549  rect.height += target->GetLink()->GetHeight();
9550  }
9551 
9552  if (label) {
9553  rect.x += kLeftInset;
9554  rect.width -= kLeftInset;
9555  rect.y += kTopInset;
9556  rect.height -= kTopInset;
9557  }
9558 
9559  return rect;
9560 }
9561 
9562 int TrackPanel::GetVRulerWidth() const
9563 {
9564  return vrulerSize.x;
9565 }
9566 
9568 void TrackPanel::DisplaySelection()
9569 {
9570  if (!mListener)
9571  return;
9572 
9573  // DM: Note that the Selection Bar can actually MODIFY the selection
9574  // if snap-to mode is on!!!
9575  mListener->TP_DisplaySelection();
9576 }
9577 
9578 Track *TrackPanel::GetFocusedTrack()
9579 {
9580  return mAx->GetFocus();
9581 }
9582 
9583 void TrackPanel::SetFocusedTrack( Track *t )
9584 {
9585  // Make sure we always have the first linked track of a stereo track
9586  if (t && !t->GetLinked() && t->GetLink())
9587  t = (WaveTrack*)t->GetLink();
9588 
9589  if (AudacityProject::GetKeyboardCaptureHandler()) {
9590  AudacityProject::ReleaseKeyboard(this);
9591  }
9592 
9593  if (t && t->GetKind() == Track::Label) {
9594  AudacityProject::CaptureKeyboard(this);
9595  }
9596 
9597  mAx->SetFocus( t );
9598  Refresh( false );
9599 }
9600 
9601 void TrackPanel::OnSetFocus(wxFocusEvent & WXUNUSED(event))
9602 {
9603  SetFocusedTrack( GetFocusedTrack() );
9604  Refresh( false );
9605 }
9606 
9607 void TrackPanel::OnKillFocus(wxFocusEvent & WXUNUSED(event))
9608 {
9609  if (AudacityProject::HasKeyboardCapture(this))
9610  {
9611  AudacityProject::ReleaseKeyboard(this);
9612  }
9613  Refresh( false);
9614 }
9615 
9616 void TrackPanel::OnActivateOrDeactivateApp(wxActivateEvent &event)
9617 {
9618 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_SCRUBBING_BASIC
9619  if (event.GetActive())
9620  mScrubHasFocus = IsScrubbing();
9621  else
9622  mScrubHasFocus = false;
9623 #endif
9624 
9625  event.Skip();
9626 }
9627 
9628 /**********************************************************************
9629 
9630  TrackInfo code is destined to move out of this file.
9631  Code should become a lot cleaner when we have sizers.
9632 
9633 **********************************************************************/
9634 
9635 TrackInfo::TrackInfo(TrackPanel * pParentIn)
9636 {
9637  pParent = pParentIn;
9638 
9639  wxRect rect(0, 0, 1000, 1000);
9640  wxRect sliderRect;
9641 
9642  GetGainRect(rect, sliderRect);
9643 
9644  /* i18n-hint: Title of the Gain slider, used to adjust the volume */
9645  mGain = new LWSlider(pParent, _("Gain"),
9646  wxPoint(sliderRect.x, sliderRect.y),
9647  wxSize(sliderRect.width, sliderRect.height),
9648  DB_SLIDER);
9649  mGain->SetDefaultValue(1.0);
9650  mGainCaptured = new LWSlider(pParent, _("Gain"),
9651  wxPoint(sliderRect.x, sliderRect.y),
9652  wxSize(sliderRect.width, sliderRect.height),
9653  DB_SLIDER);
9654  mGainCaptured->SetDefaultValue(1.0);
9655 
9656  GetPanRect(rect, sliderRect);
9657 
9658  /* i18n-hint: Title of the Pan slider, used to move the sound left or right */
9659  mPan = new LWSlider(pParent, _("Pan"),
9660  wxPoint(sliderRect.x, sliderRect.y),
9661  wxSize(sliderRect.width, sliderRect.height),
9662  PAN_SLIDER);
9663  mPan->SetDefaultValue(0.0);
9664  mPanCaptured = new LWSlider(pParent, _("Pan"),
9665  wxPoint(sliderRect.x, sliderRect.y),
9666  wxSize(sliderRect.width, sliderRect.height),
9667  PAN_SLIDER);
9668  mPanCaptured->SetDefaultValue(0.0);
9669 
9670  int fontSize = 10;
9671  mFont.Create(fontSize, wxFONTFAMILY_SWISS, wxFONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wxFONTWEIGHT_NORMAL);
9672 
9673  int allowableWidth = GetTrackInfoWidth() - 2; // 2 to allow for left/right borders
9674  int textWidth, textHeight;
9675  do {
9676  mFont.SetPointSize(fontSize);
9677  pParent->GetTextExtent(_("Stereo, 999999Hz"),
9678  &textWidth,
9679  &textHeight,
9680  NULL,
9681  NULL,
9682  &mFont);
9683  fontSize--;
9684  } while (textWidth >= allowableWidth);
9685 }
9686 
9687 TrackInfo::~TrackInfo()
9688 {
9689  delete mGainCaptured;
9690  delete mGain;
9691  delete mPanCaptured;
9692  delete mPan;
9693 }
9694 
9695 static const int kTrackInfoWidth = 100;
9696 static const int kTrackInfoBtnSize = 16; // widely used dimension, usually height
9697 
9698 int TrackInfo::GetTrackInfoWidth() const
9699 {
9700  return kTrackInfoWidth;
9701 }
9702 
9703 void TrackInfo::GetCloseBoxRect(const wxRect & rect, wxRect & dest) const
9704 {
9705  dest.x = rect.x;
9706  dest.y = rect.y;
9707  dest.width = kTrackInfoBtnSize;
9708  dest.height = kTrackInfoBtnSize;
9709 }
9710 
9711 void TrackInfo::GetTitleBarRect(const wxRect & rect, wxRect & dest) const
9712 {
9713  dest.x = rect.x + kTrackInfoBtnSize; // to right of CloseBoxRect
9714  dest.y = rect.y;
9715  dest.width = kTrackInfoWidth - rect.x - kTrackInfoBtnSize; // to right of CloseBoxRect
9716  dest.height = kTrackInfoBtnSize;
9717 }
9718 
9719 void TrackInfo::GetMuteSoloRect(const wxRect & rect, wxRect & dest, bool solo, bool bHasSoloButton) const
9720 {
9721  dest.x = rect.x ;
9722  dest.y = rect.y + 50;
9723  dest.width = 48;
9724  dest.height = kTrackInfoBtnSize;
9725 
9726  if( !bHasSoloButton )
9727  {
9728  dest.width +=48;
9729  }
9730  else if (solo)
9731  {
9732  dest.x += 48;
9733  }
9734 }
9735 
9736 void TrackInfo::GetGainRect(const wxRect & rect, wxRect & dest) const
9737 {
9738  dest.x = rect.x + 7;
9739  dest.y = rect.y + 70;
9740  dest.width = 84;
9741  dest.height = 25;
9742 }
9743 
9744 void TrackInfo::GetPanRect(const wxRect & rect, wxRect & dest) const
9745 {
9746  dest.x = rect.x + 7;
9747  dest.y = rect.y + 100;
9748  dest.width = 84;
9749  dest.height = 25;
9750 }
9751 
9752 void TrackInfo::GetMinimizeRect(const wxRect & rect, wxRect &dest) const
9753 {
9754  const int kBlankWidth = kTrackInfoBtnSize + 4;
9755  dest.x = rect.x + kBlankWidth;
9756  dest.y = rect.y + rect.height - 19;
9757  // Width is kTrackInfoWidth less space on left for track select and on right for sync-lock icon.
9758  dest.width = kTrackInfoWidth - (2 * kBlankWidth);
9759  dest.height = kTrackInfoBtnSize;
9760 }
9761 
9762 void TrackInfo::GetSyncLockIconRect(const wxRect & rect, wxRect &dest) const
9763 {
9764  dest.x = rect.x + kTrackInfoWidth - kTrackInfoBtnSize - 4; // to right of minimize button
9765  dest.y = rect.y + rect.height - 19;
9766  dest.width = kTrackInfoBtnSize;
9767  dest.height = kTrackInfoBtnSize;
9768 }
9769 
9770 
9772 void TrackInfo::SetTrackInfoFont(wxDC * dc) const
9773 {
9774  dc->SetFont(mFont);
9775 }
9776 
9777 void TrackInfo::DrawBordersWithin(wxDC* dc, const wxRect & rect, bool bHasMuteSolo) const
9778 {
9779  AColor::Dark(dc, false); // same color as border of toolbars (ToolBar::OnPaint())
9780 
9781  // below close box and title bar
9782  AColor::Line(*dc, rect.x, rect.y + kTrackInfoBtnSize, kTrackInfoWidth, rect.y + kTrackInfoBtnSize);
9783 
9784  // between close box and title bar
9785  AColor::Line(*dc, rect.x + kTrackInfoBtnSize, rect.y, rect.x + kTrackInfoBtnSize, rect.y + kTrackInfoBtnSize);
9786 
9787  if( bHasMuteSolo && (rect.height > (66+18) ))
9788  {
9789  AColor::Line(*dc, rect.x, rect.y + 50, kTrackInfoWidth, rect.y + 50); // above mute/solo
9790  AColor::Line(*dc, rect.x + 48 , rect.y + 50, rect.x + 48, rect.y + 66); // between mute/solo
9791  AColor::Line(*dc, rect.x, rect.y + 66, kTrackInfoWidth, rect.y + 66); // below mute/solo
9792  }
9793 
9794  // left of and above minimize button
9795  wxRect minimizeRect;
9796  this->GetMinimizeRect(rect, minimizeRect);
9797  AColor::Line(*dc, minimizeRect.x - 1, minimizeRect.y,
9798  minimizeRect.x - 1, minimizeRect.y + minimizeRect.height);
9799  AColor::Line(*dc, minimizeRect.x, minimizeRect.y - 1,
9800  minimizeRect.x + minimizeRect.width, minimizeRect.y - 1);
9801 }
9802 
9803 void TrackInfo::DrawBackground(wxDC * dc, const wxRect & rect, bool bSelected,
9804  bool WXUNUSED(bHasMuteSolo), const int labelw, const int WXUNUSED(vrul)) const
9805 {
9806  // fill in label
9807  wxRect fill = rect;
9808  fill.width = labelw-4;
9809  AColor::MediumTrackInfo(dc, bSelected);
9810  dc->DrawRectangle(fill);
9811 
9812  // Vaughan, 2010-09-16: No more bevels around controls area. Now only around buttons.
9813  //if( bHasMuteSolo )
9814  //{
9815  // fill=wxRect( rect.x+1, rect.y+17, vrul-6, 32);
9816  // AColor::BevelTrackInfo( *dc, true, fill );
9817  //
9818  // fill=wxRect( rect.x+1, rect.y+67, fill.width, rect.height-87);
9819  // AColor::BevelTrackInfo( *dc, true, fill );
9820  //}
9821  //else
9822  //{
9823  // fill=wxRect( rect.x+1, rect.y+17, vrul-6, rect.height-37);
9824  // AColor::BevelTrackInfo( *dc, true, fill );
9825  //}
9826 }
9827 
9828 void TrackInfo::GetTrackControlsRect(const wxRect & rect, wxRect & dest) const
9829 {
9830  wxRect top;
9831  wxRect bot;
9832 
9833  GetTitleBarRect(rect, top);
9834  GetMinimizeRect(rect, bot);
9835 
9836  dest.x = rect.x;
9837  dest.width = kTrackInfoWidth - dest.x;
9838  dest.y = top.GetBottom() + 2; // BUG
9839  dest.height = bot.GetTop() - top.GetBottom() - 2;
9840 }
9841 
9842 
9843 void TrackInfo::DrawCloseBox(wxDC * dc, const wxRect & rect, bool down) const
9844 {
9845  wxRect bev;
9846  GetCloseBoxRect(rect, bev);
9847 
9848 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_THEMING
9849  wxPen pen( theTheme.Colour( clrTrackPanelText ));
9850  dc->SetPen( pen );
9851 #else
9852  dc->SetPen(*wxBLACK_PEN);
9853 #endif
9854 
9855  // Draw the "X"
9856  const int s = 6;
9857 
9858  int ls = bev.x + ((bev.width - s) / 2);
9859  int ts = bev.y + ((bev.height - s) / 2);
9860  int rs = ls + s;
9861  int bs = ts + s;
9862 
9863  AColor::Line(*dc, ls, ts, rs, bs);
9864  AColor::Line(*dc, ls + 1, ts, rs + 1, bs);
9865  AColor::Line(*dc, rs, ts, ls, bs);
9866  AColor::Line(*dc, rs + 1, ts, ls + 1, bs);
9867 
9868  bev.Inflate(-1, -1);
9869  AColor::BevelTrackInfo(*dc, !down, bev);
9870 }
9871 
9872 void TrackInfo::DrawTitleBar(wxDC * dc, const wxRect & rect, Track * t,
9873  bool down) const
9874 {
9875  wxRect bev;
9876  GetTitleBarRect(rect, bev);
9877  bev.Inflate(-1, -1);
9878 
9879  // Draw title text
9880  SetTrackInfoFont(dc);
9881  wxString titleStr = t->GetName();
9882  int allowableWidth = kTrackInfoWidth - 38 - kLeftInset;
9883 
9884  wxCoord textWidth, textHeight;
9885  dc->GetTextExtent(titleStr, &textWidth, &textHeight);
9886  while (textWidth > allowableWidth) {
9887  titleStr = titleStr.Left(titleStr.Length() - 1);
9888  dc->GetTextExtent(titleStr, &textWidth, &textHeight);
9889  }
9890 
9891  // wxGTK leaves little scraps (antialiasing?) of the
9892  // characters if they are repeatedly drawn. This
9893  // happens when holding down mouse button and moving
9894  // in and out of the title bar. So clear it first.
9895  AColor::MediumTrackInfo(dc, t->GetSelected());
9896  dc->DrawRectangle(bev);
9897  dc->DrawText(titleStr, bev.x + 2, bev.y + (bev.height - textHeight) / 2);
9898 
9899  // Pop-up triangle
9900 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_THEMING
9901  wxColour c = theTheme.Colour( clrTrackPanelText );
9902 #else
9903  wxColour c = *wxBLACK;
9904 #endif
9905 
9906  dc->SetPen(c);
9907  dc->SetBrush(c);
9908 
9909  int s = 10; // Width of dropdown arrow...height is half of width
9910  AColor::Arrow(*dc,
9911  bev.GetRight() - s - 3, // 3 to offset from right border
9912  bev.y + ((bev.height - (s / 2)) / 2),
9913  s);
9914 
9915  AColor::BevelTrackInfo(*dc, !down, bev);
9916 }
9917 
9919 void TrackInfo::DrawMuteSolo(wxDC * dc, const wxRect & rect, Track * t,
9920  bool down, bool solo, bool bHasSoloButton) const
9921 {
9922  wxRect bev;
9923  if( solo && !bHasSoloButton )
9924  return;
9925  GetMuteSoloRect(rect, bev, solo, bHasSoloButton);
9926  bev.Inflate(-1, -1);
9927 
9928  if (bev.y + bev.height >= rect.y + rect.height - 19)
9929  return; // don't draw mute and solo buttons, because they don't fit into track label
9930 
9931  AColor::MediumTrackInfo( dc, t->GetSelected());
9932  if( solo )
9933  {
9934  if( t->GetSolo() )
9935  {
9936  AColor::Solo(dc, t->GetSolo(), t->GetSelected());
9937  }
9938  }
9939  else
9940  {
9941  if( t->GetMute() )
9942  {
9943  AColor::Mute(dc, t->GetMute(), t->GetSelected(), t->GetSolo());
9944  }
9945  }
9946  //(solo) ? AColor::Solo(dc, t->GetSolo(), t->GetSelected()) :
9947  // AColor::Mute(dc, t->GetMute(), t->GetSelected(), t->GetSolo());
9948  dc->SetPen( *wxTRANSPARENT_PEN );//No border!
9949  dc->DrawRectangle(bev);
9950 
9951  wxCoord textWidth, textHeight;
9952  wxString str = (solo) ?
9953  /* i18n-hint: This is on a button that will silence this track.*/
9954  _("Solo") :
9955  /* i18n-hint: This is on a button that will silence all the other tracks.*/
9956  _("Mute");
9957 
9958  SetTrackInfoFont(dc);
9959  dc->GetTextExtent(str, &textWidth, &textHeight);
9960  dc->DrawText(str, bev.x + (bev.width - textWidth) / 2, bev.y + (bev.height - textHeight) / 2);
9961 
9962  AColor::BevelTrackInfo(*dc, (solo?t->GetSolo():t->GetMute()) == down, bev);
9963 
9964  if (solo && !down) {
9965  // Update the mute button, which may be grayed out depending on
9966  // the state of the solo button.
9967  DrawMuteSolo(dc, rect, t, false, false, bHasSoloButton);
9968  }
9969 }
9970 
9971 // Draw the minimize button *and* the sync-lock track icon, if necessary.
9972 void TrackInfo::DrawMinimize(wxDC * dc, const wxRect & rect, Track * t, bool down) const
9973 {
9974  wxRect bev;
9975  GetMinimizeRect(rect, bev);
9976 
9977  // Clear background to get rid of previous arrow
9978  AColor::MediumTrackInfo(dc, t->GetSelected());
9979  dc->DrawRectangle(bev);
9980 
9981 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_THEMING
9982  wxColour c = theTheme.Colour(clrTrackPanelText);
9983  dc->SetBrush(c);
9984  dc->SetPen(c);
9985 #else
9986  AColor::Dark(dc, t->GetSelected());
9987 #endif
9988 
9989  AColor::Arrow(*dc,
9990  bev.x - 5 + bev.width / 2,
9991  bev.y - 2 + bev.height / 2,
9992  10,
9993  t->GetMinimized());
9994 
9995  AColor::BevelTrackInfo(*dc, !down, bev);
9996 }
9997 
9998 #ifdef EXPERIMENTAL_MIDI_OUT
9999 void TrackInfo::DrawVelocitySlider(wxDC *dc, NoteTrack *t, wxRect rect) const
10000 {
10001  wxRect gainRect;
10002  int index = t->GetIndex();
10003  EnsureSufficientSliders(index);
10004  GetGainRect(rect, gainRect);
10005  if (gainRect.y + gainRect.height < rect.y + rect.height - 19) {
10006  mGains[index]->SetStyle(VEL_SLIDER);
10007  GainSlider(index)->Move(wxPoint(gainRect.x, gainRect.y));
10008  GainSlider(index)->Set(t->GetGain());
10009  GainSlider(index)->OnPaint(*dc, t->GetSelected());
10010  }
10011 }
10012 #endif
10013 
10014 void TrackInfo::DrawSliders(wxDC *dc, WaveTrack *t, wxRect rect, bool captured) const
10015 {
10016  wxRect sliderRect;
10017 
10018  GetGainRect(rect, sliderRect);
10019  if (sliderRect.y + sliderRect.height < rect.y + rect.height - 19) {
10020  GainSlider(t, captured)->OnPaint(*dc);
10021  }
10022 
10023  GetPanRect(rect, sliderRect);
10024  if (sliderRect.y + sliderRect.height < rect.y + rect.height - 19) {
10025  PanSlider(t, captured)->OnPaint(*dc);
10026  }
10027 }
10028 
10029 LWSlider * TrackInfo::GainSlider(WaveTrack *t, bool captured) const
10030 {
10031  wxRect rect(kLeftInset, t->GetY() - pParent->GetViewInfo()->vpos + kTopInset, 1, t->GetHeight());
10032  wxRect sliderRect;
10033  GetGainRect(rect, sliderRect);
10034 
10035  wxPoint pos = sliderRect.GetPosition();
10036  float gain = t->GetGain();
10037 
10038  mGain->Move(pos);
10039  mGain->Set(gain);
10040  mGainCaptured->Move(pos);
10041  mGainCaptured->Set(gain);
10042 
10043  return captured ? mGainCaptured : mGain;
10044 }
10045 
10046 LWSlider * TrackInfo::PanSlider(WaveTrack *t, bool captured) const
10047 {
10048  wxRect rect(kLeftInset, t->GetY() - pParent->GetViewInfo()->vpos + kTopInset, 1, t->GetHeight());
10049  wxRect sliderRect;
10050  GetPanRect(rect, sliderRect);
10051 
10052  wxPoint pos = sliderRect.GetPosition();
10053  float pan = t->GetPan();
10054 
10055  mPan->Move(pos);
10056  mPan->Set(pan);
10057  mPanCaptured->Move(pos);
10058  mPanCaptured->Set(pan);
10059 
10060  return captured ? mPanCaptured : mPan;
10061 }
10062 
10063 static TrackPanel * TrackPanelFactory(wxWindow * parent,
10064  wxWindowID id,
10065  const wxPoint & pos,
10066  const wxSize & size,
10067  TrackList * tracks,
10068  ViewInfo * viewInfo,
10069  TrackPanelListener * listener,
10070  AdornedRulerPanel * ruler)
10071 {
10072  wxASSERT(parent); // to justify safenew
10073  return safenew TrackPanel(
10074  parent,
10075  id,
10076  pos,
10077  size,
10078  tracks,
10079  viewInfo,
10080  listener,
10081  ruler);
10082 }
10083 
10084 
10085 // Declare the static factory function.
10086 // We defined it in the class.
10087 TrackPanel *(*TrackPanel::FactoryFunction)(
10088  wxWindow * parent,
10089  wxWindowID id,
10090  const wxPoint & pos,
10091  const wxSize & size,
10092  TrackList * tracks,
10093  ViewInfo * viewInfo,
10094  TrackPanelListener * listener,
10095  AdornedRulerPanel * ruler) = TrackPanelFactory;
